description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Check Point Security Gateway R75.40VS, R75.45, R75.46, R75.47, R76, R77, and R77.10, when the (1) IPS blade, (2) IPsec Remote Access, (3) Mobile Access / SSL VPN blade, (4) SSL Network Extender, (5) Identify Awareness blade, (6) HTTPS Inspection, (7) UserCheck, or (8) Data Leak Prevention blade module is enabled, allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service ("stability issue") via an unspecified "traffic condition."
